attributes.action: To scrap the 10 day self-isolation for people who had covid when returning to UK
attributes.additional_details: The government is the only institution that can change travel rules.
attributes.background: I want Government to discuss travel rules for unvaccinated people who had covid in the past and therefore developed the immunity as good as the one given by the vaccine (although the natural immunity should be better than the vaccine). Recovered people have protection as well as vaccinated people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Recognise immune response to Covid-19 in the Covid pass:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600576
